resources.string: Kashe hotspot na hannu kafin watsawa
Cirewa daga hanyoyin sadarwar Wi-Fi na oxiliari kafin watsawa
Disconnect from auxiliary WLAN networks before casting
"Ka na iya ci gaba da watsawa idan allon na'urarka na kashe. Wannan siffar na rage yawan cin wutar batir."
Kar a nuna sanarwa dake bambarowa, kiran dake shigowa, da wasu abubuwa na sirri akan allo na waje
Rage girman tagar da ake watsa midiya a kai saboda ka iya amfani da wasu siffofi akan wayarka
Ba da izini ma watsawa akan TV ka da farko
Ya kasa ba da izinin watsawa akan TV ka. Jira minti daya ko biyu sai ka gwada kuma.
Wannan manhajar na buƙatar isa ga wurinku don samun damar sa ido na waje a kusa. Zaɓi \"Ya ba da izini kullum\" yayin bada wannan izinin don kauce wa kurakurai da ka iya faruwa.

"Bada izinin Watsa midiya don yin rikodin sauti, isowa ga fayiloli a cikin ma'ajin ciki, da isowa ga wurin ku don samun damar yin amfani da wannan siffar a koyaushe. Taba \"Saittuna\" kuma zaɓi \"Izinin manhaja\" don ka ci gaba."
Turn on WLAN to be able to cast using NFC. Turn on now?

%1$d. Haɗa wayoyinka guda biyu da TV akan hanyar sadarwar Wi-Fi iri ɗaya.

%2$d. A kan wasu irin TV, wannan yanayin yana samuwa ne kawai idan madubin allon na kunne. Duba \"Taimako\" don ƙarin koyo

%1$d. Connect both your mobile device and TV to the same WLAN network.

%2$d. On some TV models, this feature is only available when screen mirroring is on. View \"Help\" to learn more.
"Tabbatar cewa siffar watsawa na marawa kunne akan na'urar da aka nufa. Duba taimako idan ka na da matsalar hadawa da intanit."

"%1$d. Haɗa duka na'urarku ta hannu da TV zuwa cibiyar sadarwar Wi-Fi iri ɗaya.
%2$d. Duba \"Taimako\" don ƙarin bayani."

"%1$d. Connect both your mobile device and TV to the same WLAN network.
%2$d. View \"Help\" to learn more."
Kunna Wi-Fi ko Bluetooth akan wayarka don ka yi amfani Nunawa na Marawa.
Turn on WLAN, Bluetooth, and location services to be able to use casting. Turn on now?
Kunna Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, da sabis na wuri don samun damar yin watsawa. Kunna yanzu?
Watsa abun dake yi akan allo zuwa wani allon waje

Karanta kuma ka yarda da Yarjejeniyar Mai amfani da Sharuddan Bayanai kafin amfani da wannan manhajar.
Idan baku yarda da amfani da ayyukan da aka ambata ba, ba za ku iya amfani da wasu abubuwan wannan manhajar ba; duk da haka, aikinsa na asali zai kasance a gare ku.
Barka da zuwa Watsawar midiya! Wannan manhajar yana samar da ayyuka masu zuwa:
Amfani da ƙananan windows, simintin gyaran allo, da ɓoye abubuwa masu zaman kansu.
Haskaka abubuwan daga allon wayarka a kan babban allo na waje.

Muna buƙatar tattara keɓaɓɓun bayanan sirri don samar muku da ayyukan yau da kullun da inganta aikin watsawar midiya. Kuna iya koyon yadda muke sarrafa bayanan da muka tattara a cikin Sharuddan Bayanai. Kuna iya janye izinin ku ga Dokar Sirri a cikin Saituna kowane lokaci.
"Ci gaba da watsawa idan allon na'urarka na kashe. Wannan siffar na rage yawan cin batir. Danna madannin kunnawan ka sake kunna allon."
Yana shirin watsawa da allon a kashe…
Watsawa shine haskaka abubuwa daga allon wayarka zuwa kan wata baban monita na waje. Yana ba ka damar rabar da hotuna da bidiyoyi da abokanka da iyalanka ba tare da amfani da bayanan mobayil ba.
Yaya ake watsa abubuwa akan allon babban allo?
"Mataki na %1$d: Duba na'urorinku da yanayin hanyar sadarwa"

"%1$d. Xiaomi TVs, set-top boxes, projectors: Connect both your mobile device and external monitor to the same WLAN network for best effect. If they are connected to different networks, it might take more time to find the external monitor and connect. Note: Older TV models might not support casting across different networks. %2$d. If you're using TVs, set-top boxes, or projectors of other brands, connect both your mobile device and external monitor to the same WLAN network. If the two devices can't be connected to the same network, turn on Miracast on your external monitor. The naming of Miracast functionality might vary."

"%1$d. Xiaomi TVs, Mi Boxes, da Mi projectors: Ka haɗa na'urar ka da allon kwanfutarka ta waje zuwa hanyar sadarwar Wi-Fi don kyakkyawan sakamako. Idan sun hadu zuwa hanyoyin sadarwa daban-daban, zai iya ɗaukar lokaci mai tsawo kafin a sami allon kwanfutarka sai ka hada. Kula: tsofaffin Mi TV na iya kasa aiki da watsawa na hanyoyin sadarwa. %2$d Idan kana amfani da TVs, akwatunan set-top, ko furojekta na wasu daban, haɗa da na'urar ka da allon kwamfutarka ta waje zuwa hanyar sadarwa Wi-Fi ɗayan. Idan na'urorinka guda biyun su ka kasa hadawa da hanyar sadarwa dayan, kunna Miracast a kan allon kwamfutarka ta waje. Sunan na ayyukan Miracast na iya bambanta."
"Tap the \"Cast\" toggle on your phone's Notification shade. Turn on both WLAN and Bluetooth for a more stable connection."
"Taba maballi '' Watsa'' akan inuwar sanarwa na na'urarka. Kunna Wi-Fi da Bluetooth dun hadawar intanit yayi kyau."
Idan kuna son jefa hotuna, bidiyo, wasanni, ko gabatarwa, zaku iya amfani da fasalulluwar simintin gyare-gyare a cikin manhajar da suka dace.
"Zabi wata na'ura na waje daga jerin na'urorin da akwai don ka fara watsawa."
"Bai iya hadawa da na'ura na waje?"

"%1$d. If you want to use a Xiaomi device, but can't find it in the list of available devices, try the following: Connect both your mobile device and the external monitor (e.g. your TV) to the same network, or connect the external monitor to your mobile device's hotspot. If there aren't any networks available or you can't connect both devices to the same network, check whether the casting features on your external monitor are up to date, turn on Bluetooth both on your mobile device and the external monitor, and turn on Miracast on your TV. %2$d. If you're casting on a Xiaomi device for the first time, you need to complete verification. %3$d. If you want to use a non-Xiaomi device, but can't find it in the list of available devices, try the following: Connect both your mobile device and the external monitor (e.g. your TV) to the same network, or connect the external monitor to your mobile device's hotspot. If this doesn't help, install the HappyCast app on your TV and follow the instructions."

"%1$d. Idan ka an amfani da na'urra Xiaomi, amma ka kasa samun sa a cikin jerin na'urorin da akwai, gwada wadannan: Hada na'urarka da monita na wajen (misali TV ka) da Wi-Fi dayan, ko ka hada monita na waje da hotspot din na'urarka. Idan babu sadarwar Wi-Fi ko kuma bai iya hada na'urori biyun akan hanyar sadarwa dayan, bincika ko siffofin watsawa dake akan monitan ka na waje na daidai da rana, kunna Bluetooth akan na'urarka da monitar na waje, sai ka kunna Miracast akan TV ka. %2$d. Idan kana watsawa akan na'urar Xiaomi a karo na fari, dole ka kammala tabbatarwa. %3$d. Idan kana son ka yi amfani da na'urar da ba na Xiaomi ba, amma ka kasa samu sa a cikin jerin na'urorin da akwai, gwada wadannan: Hada na'urarka da monita na wajen (misali TV ka) da Wi-Fi dayan, ko ka hada monita na waje da hotspot din na'urarka."
"Aiki na Miracast akan na'urori daba daban"

"Kana iya haskaka abubuwa daga wayarka na Mi zuwa kowane irin Mi TV masu aiki da Bluetoothn ba tare da kunnawan Miracast da kanka ba. Idan ka na neman kunna Miracast, danna madanin [MENU] sai ka zabi manhaja > Watsawa > Miracast."

"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ya dace akan na'urarka. Akan wasu iri, kana iya danna madanin [SOURCE] a kan ramut sai ka zabi '' Madubin Allo''. Wanna siffar na kunne a asali akan iri da yawa."
"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ta dace da na'urarka. Wannan siffar na kunne a asali akan iri da yawa."
"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ta dace da na'urarka. Wannan siffar na kunne a asali akan iri da yawa."
"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ya dace akan na'urarka. Akan wasu iri, kana iya danna madanin [MENU] a kan ramut sai ka zabi Saittuna > Hadin > Hanyar sadarwa > Alluna da yawa."

"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ya dace akan na'urarka. Akan wasu iri, kana iya danna madanin [SMART] a kan ramut sai ka zabi Watsawa > Nuawa na Marawaya. Wasu irin sun dace da watsawa na wasanni: Watsawa barka > Watsa wasanni > Android."
"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ta dace da na'urarka. Akan wasu irin, kana iya zabar Manhaja > Watsawa > Na'urar Android > Miracast."

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [SOURCE] button on the remote control and then select \"Screen Mirroring\". On some other models, you can turn this feature on in Networks > WLAN Direct. This feature is turned on by default on various models.
"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ta dace da na'urarka. Akan wasu irin, kana iya zabar Manhaja > Madubin Allo."
Bincika saittunan TV ɗinka don tabbatar da cewa allon kwamfutarka a waje ya dace da aikin Miracast.
"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ta dace da na'urarka. Akan wasu irin, kana iya zabar Manhaja > Nunawar Allo."
"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ta dace da na'urarka. Idan kana neman kunna wannan siffar jeka zuwa Manhaja na > Nunawar WiFi."
"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ta dace da na'urarka. Akan wasu irin, kana iya kunna wanna siffar a cikin Saittuna > Hanyoyin sadarwa > Alluna da yawa > Nunawa na Marawaya."

"Idan ka kasa hadawa na hanyar sadarwa, tabbatar monitan ka na waje ta dace da aikin Miracast kuma ta na kunne. Akan wasu iri, ana kiran wannan siffar kamar Nunawa Marawa, Madubi na Allo, ko Alluna Da yawa. Duba bayanai a kasa don ka koyi yadda ake kunna Miracast. %1$d. Idan ka hadu da wasu matsaloli kana ka yi rahoton su ta hanyar manhajar mu na '' Sabis & ra'ayi."

"Idan ka kasa hadawa na hanyar sadarwa, tabbatar monitan ka na waje ta dace da aikin Miracast kuma ta na kunne. Akan wasu iri, ana kiran wannan siffar kamar Nunawa Marawa, Madubi na Allo, ko Alluna Da yawa. %1$d. Idan ka hadu da wasu matsaloli kana ka yi rahoton su ta hanyar manhajar mu na '' Sabis & ra'ayi."
"Idan na irin na'urarka ba ya cikin wannan jerin, tumtubu ma'aikatar don ka samu karin bayani game ayyukan watsawa."
"Ba'a iya an yi lodin abubuwa ba"
"Na'urorin da ka haɗa, amma ba a yi musu alama amintacce ba"
"Na'urorin da ka haɗa, amma ba a yi musu alama amintacce ba"
"Babu na'urorin da aka haɗa a baya anan"

Wannan manhaja rna bukatar hadawa da intanit da tattara bayananka na sirri don iya aikin daidai. Don fahimtar da incin ka harda kuma hanyoyin da kake amfani da bayananka, karanta kuma ka yarda da Yarjejeniyar Mai amfani da Sharuddan Bayanan mu.
HappyCast ke bada sabisin wasu siffofi. Kafin amfani da wannan siffar, karanta kuma ka amince da Sharuudan Bayanan HappyCast da Bayanan doka na HappyCast.

Barka da zuwa Watsawa! Watsawa yana ba da izinin aiwatar da abubuwan daga allon wayarka akan babban monita na waje. Wannan manhajar yana buƙatar haɗi zuwa intanet kuma yana buƙatar izini masu izini don iya yin aiki na yau da kullun:
"Na gano na'urorin da akwai a kusa"
"Na gano na'urorin da akwai a kusa"
Waɗannan izini ana buƙatar su ne don siffofi na asali da sabis su kasance akwai.
"Na hadawar na'urori ta hanyar amfani da NFC"
An yi amfani dashi ma karin siffofi yayin da kuke amfani dasu
"Na gano na'urorin da akwai a kusa"
"Na gano na'urorin da akwai a kusa"

"Barka da zuwa Watsawa! Watsawa na ba da izinin haskaka abubuwa daga allon wayar ka zuwa wata babban allo na monita. Dole mu kare bayananka na sirri bisa ga dokoki da ka'idodi, da sharuddan bayanai. Wata kamfanin ba da sabis sabis daban na HappyCast ke ba da siffofi. Kafin amfani dasu, karanta kuma ka amince da Bayanan Doka ta HappyCast da Sharuddan Bayanan HappyCast. Don ya iya aiki daidai, wannan manhajar na iya hadawa da intanit kuma ya bukaci wadannan izini domin ya tattara bayananka na sirri:"

"Idan ba ka yarda ka ba da wannan izini ba ko rabarwa da aika bayananka na sirri, ba zaka iya amfani da wannan manhajar ba. Kana iya zabar ka cire wannan manhaja, fita daga ciki, ko takaita izini a cikin Saittuna a irin wadannan lokuta. Karanta kuma ka amince da Yarjejjeniyar Mai Amfanin mu da Sharuddan Bayanan mu kafin amfani da wannan siffar>"

" •Iso ga kuma ka ajiye hotuna akan na'urarka saboda haskaka wadannan abubuwa akan monita na waje •Nadi kiran waya da sauti don ka iya watsa sauti akan na'urori na waje •Iso ga lambar waya, IMEI, da IMSI don ka gano na'urarka •Iso ga wurin da kake don ka gano na'urorin dake kusa"
"Kunna watsawa na mara waya akan na'urar da aka nufa"
"Na'urorin waje na da saukin ganowa idan aka hada su da hanyar sadarwa dayan da wayarku"
"Duba '' Taimako'' Idan ba ka samu na'urori ba"
"Ka na iya ci gaba da watsawa idan allon na'urarka na kashe. Wannan siffar na rage yawan cin wutar batir."
Kar a nuna sanarwa dake bambarowa, kiran dake shigowa, da wasu abubuwa na sirri akan allo na waje.
Rage girman tagar da ake watsa midiya a kai saboda ka iya amfani da wasu siffofi akan wayarka.
Nuna gabatarwa akan allon waje yayin da da kake amfani da wayarka don ka canza tsakanin silayid da ganin rubutu. Jeka cikin Manajan Fayil > Takardu don ka gwada wannan siffar.
Taba madannin rabarwa a karkashin wani abu a cikin manhajar Galari don ka nuna shi zuwa allon na waje.
Turbo na Wasa na baka damar watsa wassanni zuwa allon waje. Yi amfani da gajeren hanya a cikin akwatin Turbo na Wasa don ka kunna wannan siffar.
Watsa takardu, wasanni, hotuna, da bidiyoyi
Ya kasa rage wannan manhajar yayin da ake watsawa
Taba ka duba karin siffofi na watsawa
Ba za a iya amfani da watsa midiya yayin da Screen Combo ke aiki
"Bikin Shekarar tunawa da Dauke Shari'ar Martial"

Rana na uku na Sabuwar Shekara Cianis
Duba sababbin siffofin mu a nan
Kana yanayin inkoyito. Ba za a iya amfani da watsa midiya a yanzu ba.
Ya kasa amfani da wannan siffan da Rababben allo
Kana iya rage taga da ake watsawa do ka iya amfani da wasu siffofin wayarka ba tare da ka tsayar da watsawa ba.
Kar ka matsa da wayarka nisa
Kashe hotspot na hannu kafin watsawa
"Wadannan na'urori zasu fara bayyana anan idan sun kusa"

"%s zai fara bayyana tsakanin na'urorin da akwai da farko lokacin da yake kusa idan ka sa a matsayin amintacce.

Kana iya sarrafa amintattun na'urori a cikin Saittuna."
